title: Cub's First Winter
description: Children will be captivated by this heart-warming storybook about an inquisitive young fox cub. The elements of winter are explained, from the reason his friends are asleep, to why it's cold. Each scenic page is beautifully illustrated to depict the cub's wonderment of winter. The soothing words alongside the soft illustrations will ensure that this bedtime read will be picked up again and again."
author: Rebecca Elliott
